title: Gothic sans serif
content:
Looking for an ID to 'Rock and Rye'

More treatments at [Slow and Low](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.drinkslowandlow.com/)

Thanks everyone!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rock-and-rye-small_5841.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rock-and-rye.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/typophile.com/files/rock-and-rye.jpg) | 42.23 KB |
author: dasssss

comments.content: Can't find an exact match, but it looks like a modified **[Copperplate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Copperplate%20Gothic%20LT%20Pro%20-%2030%20AB&fid=b0681012f784c7514ea98f0517887259&fsize=60&text=ROCK%20AND%20RYE&wrap=2)**

Wasn't able to spot a match either. Don't know why and even if Fivos couldn't find it, still convinced it could be a font... Alternatives at the moment: [Alphacal JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/alphacal), [Applewood](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aerotype/applewood), [Gower Gulch JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/gower-gulch), [American Brewery DTF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/decade-typefoundry/american-brewery), [Juneway](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/juneway), [Pony Express NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/pony-xpress-nf), [Correo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/correo), [Spillsbury GATF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/spillsbury), [Tonic LHF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-tonic), [Shady Lady NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/shady-lady-nf), Adding to Don's suggestions: [Quorum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/quorum), [Newtext](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/newtext), [Laudatio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/laudatio-bq), [Symbol](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/symbol), [Havenbrook](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aah-yes/havenbrook), [Cantoria](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/cantoria-mt), [Lady Copra Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.dafont.com/lady-copra.font), [Beaufort](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123603/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/beaufort)
